p: As shown in Table 2, 50 differentially expressed miRNAs ( p < 0.001, FDR < 0.01) were obtained by primary screening at FDR < 0.01 ( p < 0.001) in which 22 were down-regulated and 28 were up-regulated. Furthermore, seven miRNA (miR-206-3p, miR-133a-5p, miR-133b-3p, miR-1-3p, miR-133a-3p, miR-1b and miR-486) were screened by the secondary sequencing of FC > 2 or FC < 0.5 which were all up-regulated by arginine ( Figure 3). Further verification by qPCR showed accordance with the differential expression of the sequencing ( Figure 4).
